name: FloraForce
description:
Created for Game Jam Easy Mode #1 (https://itch.io/jam/em-game-jam)

The original theme for this game was 'That was Unexpected'. The idea was "a game that seems like a farming simulator, but then suddenly turns into tower defense upon seeing your first vegetable seed produce an animal". Didn't get to emphasize that unfortunately. 

This was made with the help of my friend Fuchsia doing the art, designing the characters, and helping in planning.

// Scenario -->

A farmer has discovered a small area in a forest with sacred soil that over-energizes plants into animals. Upon arriving, she quickly realized that weeds have grown on similar soils and have evolved into Weedlings. These snake-like creatures are spreading everywhere possible! The florist must team up with her newfound turnip friends to stop the Weedlings from taking over the soil.

// Controls -->

This game uses only the mouse.

Use the right mouse button to move.

Click on soil to plant a seed. Once fully grown, click again to pull Turnpup. Soils that have been filled with weeds cannot be used or recovered.

Click on the grass to place a Turnpup. They will attack all Weedlings in the given area.

Return a Turnpup to your bag by clicking on them. Beware - if the Turnpup is not at full HP, it will return as a seed.

Click a Weedling once to attack it.

Sometimes, a Weedling will drop a seed. Don't forget to click the seed to pick it up!
